channel.title: Can you tell me what is wrong
channel.description:
I'm going to tell you the most I can.
This is from The Ultimate Server Guide - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html
CHAPTER 1:
First off we need a server source (Testscape personally recommended): Project16 V.2 ____________________________________________________________________________ Next, you will need to open ports in Windows Firewall and/or the firewalls offered by McAffee, Norton, or other full-system maintenance suites. For Windows Firewall, open its settings file in the control panel. Click on the "Exceptions Tab" and then click "Add Port." Add the following port: 43594. (If you'd rather not open a specific port or have to worry about Windows Firewall disabling access in any way, you can disable it entirely.)
Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into "advanced" (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the "gaming" button (is only left side for me...) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:
Name: 1 IP address: 2 TCP Ports to open: 43594 UDP Ports to open: Inbound Filter: Allow All Schedule: Always
KEY 1 = Any name you want the server to be (I.E.MyScape).[/glow] 2 = The IP adddress of your COMPUTER; not the Internet.
[IMG]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b17/martinnguyen/3-1.jpg[/img] _____________________________________________________________________ Now your server rule is nice and good. Now we need Java to get your server's compiler and runserver to work. You can download the newest java at this link:
Java SE Downloads Page
Now, click JDK 6.0
[b]this must be the updated one[/b] [IMG]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b17/martinnguyen/4-1.jpg[/img]
installed and done. here is what the file looks like - [IMG]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b17/martinnguyen/5-1.jpg[/img]
______________________________________________________________________
Ok before we can fix the compiler and runeserver, we need to set out variables. Ok go into start menu, then control panel, then system, then advanced, then enviromental variables.
start menu -> control panel -> system -> advanced -> enviromental variables
Ok now find the variable called "path" in the list in that new screen open. Rename it to "PATH" and then for it's variable value (erase old one): C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\"
You will also need to set a variables called "classpath". Make a new variable and give it the name classpath. No add this in for it's value: "C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\"
[IMG]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b17/martinnguyen/2-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b17/martinnguyen/1-3.jpg[/img]
__________________________________________________________________________
Ok now go into your server source (if you dont have a rar uncompressor you can download 7zip at this link: 7zip, or you can download rar uncompresser at this link: WinRar. Ok now you can right click the compressed source and click "extract here"), and now when in your server srouce, right click compile.bat and click "edit". Then erase everything in it and put this in it's place:
Code:
@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Ok now save it and right click runserver.bat and erase all of that and add this:
Code:
@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
Ok now we have a working source!
[IMG]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b17/martinnguyen/6.jpg[/img]
______________________________________________________________________
What is the problem?
[IMG]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b17/martinnguyen/7.jpg[/img]
_______________________________________________________________________
Please Help Me! my MSN is iMONST4R@hotmail.com or post here which i well check

item.title: Can you tell me what is wrong
item.dc:creator: @iMONSTAR iMONSTAR
item.description:
@iMONSTAR wrote:

I’m going to tell you the most I can.

This is from The Ultimate Server Guide - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html

CHAPTER 1:

First off we need a server source (Testscape personally recommended): Project16 V.2

Next, you will need to open ports in Windows Firewall and/or the firewalls offered by McAffee, Norton, or other full-system maintenance suites. For Windows Firewall, open its settings file in the control panel. Click on the “Exceptions Tab” and then click “Add Port.” Add the following port: 43594. (If you’d rather not open a specific port or have to worry about Windows Firewall disabling access in any way, you can disable it entirely.)

Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into “advanced” (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the “gaming” button (is only left side for me…) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

Name: 1
IP address: 2
TCP Ports to open: 43594
UDP Ports to open:
Inbound Filter: Allow All
Schedule: Always

KEY
1 = Any name you want the server to be (I.E.MyScape).[/glow]
2 = The IP adddress of your COMPUTER; not the Internet.

3-1.jpg800×520

Now your server rule is nice and good. Now we need Java to get your server’s compiler and runserver to work. You can download the newest java at this link:

Java SE Downloads Page

Now, click JDK 6.0

this must be the updated one

4-1.jpg799×331

installed and done. here is what the file looks like -

5-1.jpg800×646

Ok before we can fix the compiler and runeserver, we need to set out variables. Ok go into start menu, then control panel, then system, then advanced, then enviromental variables.

start menu -> control panel -> system -> advanced -> enviromental variables

Ok now find the variable called “path” in the list in that new screen open. Rename it to “PATH” and then for it’s variable value (erase old one):
C:Windows\System32;“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”

You will also need to set a variables called “classpath”. Make a new variable and give it the name classpath. No add this in for it’s value:
“C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”

2-2.jpg418×553
1-3.jpg419×552

Ok now go into your server source (if you dont have a rar uncompressor you can download 7zip at this link: 7zip, or you can download rar uncompresser at this link: WinRar. Ok now you can right click the compressed source and click “extract here”),
and now when in your server srouce, right click compile.bat and click “edit”. Then erase everything in it and put this in it’s place:

Code:

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Ok now save it and right click runserver.bat and erase all of that and add this:

Code:

@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Ok now we have a working source!

6.jpg799×421

What is the problem?

7.jpg669×676

Please Help Me! my MSN is iMONST4R@hotmail.com or post here which i well check

Read full topic
item.source: Can you tell me what is wrong
